page.title: 06Shrubs Lodge,Bubbenhall
page.content: Shrubs Lodge is south east of BUBBENHALL.The farmer is Mr.Smith.He has been there for thirty years.Before they lived there the land was used for a Rough Shoot.He is an arable farmer with a few chickens.He owns 5 fields and 2 woods.Shrubs wood is a Site of Scientific Interest,and with Burnthurst Wood covers some 45 acres. He rents 12 acres and grows potatoes for the market.His 2 most expensive pieces of machinery are his potato and combine harvester.Mr.Smith gets his water from a well,but he is having to monitor it everyday,because the Land fill site next door is altering the level of the Watertable of the surrounding land.The Ecology of this area is rich in Flora and Fauna and Mr.Smith has many restrictions on the use of his woods.
